pullRequest.body:
once coerced to an `AddGroupWithOne`. Also unify `Finset.card_disjoint_union` and `Finset.card_union_eq`

From LeanAPAP

nodes.body: :v: YaelDillies can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7864916668/job/21457250925)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7864916668/job/21457250791)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7864916668/job/21457250879)
I think it's good to have `Finset.card_union_eq_iff` which states that `(s ∪ t).card = s.card + t.card` if and only if `Disjoint s t`.
When you rename a theorem, the good practice now is to add a deprecated alias with the old name. Same thing below.
Could you please add a `Nat` version as well? It should be `rw [← card_inter_add_card_union, Nat.add_sub_cancel]`

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: `(s ∩ t).card = s.card + t.card - (s ∪ t).card`
